666.name: ðŸ”® Root of the World
666.description:
I've known this world since its beginning...
This skill is only available to RPG BETA testers.

100.name: Imbue In Poison
100.description: Imbues your weapon with poison, and when it hits the enemy, it poisons them

101.name: Fearless Strikes
101.description: Deliver a series of blows against your enemy

102.name: Behind You!
102.description: Teleports to the enemy's back, hitting them in a cowardly way. After hitting the enemy, receive a bonus agility

103.name: Unfair Blow
103.description: Nothing worse than an attack on the lower parts... Applies an armor debuff to the enemy, and then hits them right away

104.name: Frenzy
104.description: Enter a frenzy, dealing damage to the enemy and receiving a damage buff

200.name: Elemental Blessing
200.description: Plays a special song, which damages enemies while healing itself.

201.name: Song of Light
201.description: Introduce your enemies to the power of the Elder Elemental Dragon of Light from holy notes

202.name: Rosary
202.description: Invokes the hatred of the Gods to annihilate your enemies. In addition to damaging enemies, heals yourself

203.name: Acute Notes
203.description: Strikes your enemies' minds with high notes from your harp. In addition to damaging enemies, heals yourself

204.name: Play Raul!
204.description: The famous royal request. Play Raul! Play to finish off all your enemies

300.name: Eternal Punishment
300.description: Inflicts a punishment on your enemy, giving an armaruda debuff and applying poison for a short time

301.name: Iron Lady
301.description: Torture your enemies with the legendary Iron Lady. Severe damage!!

302.name: Summon Bahamut
302.description: Invokes the powers of Bahamut, who attacks his enemy sme do

303.name: Mind Warp
303.description: Twirls your enemy's mind, damaging his soul principle

304.name: Merlyer
304.description: Puts a Merlyer to fight your enemy

400.name: Shield Advance
400.description: Uses your shield for an offense-defensive attack, dealing damage to the enemy, and healing yourself, in addition to activating an armor buff

401.name: Divine Protection
401.description: Invokes the holy powers, dealing damage to enemies while improving their armor

402.name: Valkyria of the Heavens
402.description: Summons the powers of the Goddess of War, dealing damage to enemies and healing itself

403.name: Holy Trinity
403.description: Received the Triple Blessing of the Elder Dragon Elemental of Light, receiving a buff to agility, armor and damage

404.name: D.A.E.L.
404.description: Literally calls the Elder Dragon Element of Light into battle, dealing damage to enemies while healing itself

500.name: Feast of the Living Dead
500.description: Brings an army of the dead into battle, dealing damage to enemies

501.name: Full Possession
501.description: Possess the enemy in every way, decreasing their armor and their damage

502.name: Nekros Manteia
502.description: Uses the eternal power of necromancers, dealing high damage to enemies

503.name: Post Mortem Transfusion
503.description: Transfers powers from the enemy to itself, gaining agility and reducing the enemy's agility, in addition to dealing damage

504.name: Luciferum Emerges
504.description: Summons Lucifer into battle, slaying his enemies

600.name: Prismatic Sphere
600.description: Creates a sphere in the middle of the battlefield, damaging everyone who gets close

601.name: Ice Spear
601.description: Creates a sphere of ice that, upon hitting the enemy, inflicts damage and a reduction in agility

602.name: Electrolyn
602.description: Transfers energy from the skies directly to your enemy, dealing high damage

603.name: Mytril Capsule
603.description: Wraps around in a capsule made of Mytril, dealing damage to enemies while strengthening their armor

604.name: Boleham Ley Lines
604.description: Connects with Boleham's ley lines, utilizing all the true powers in the world to defeat your enemy

700.name: War Spirit
700.description: Gives the true spirit of war, strengthening in damage and armor while reducing enemy damage

701.name: Berserker's Fury
701.description: Gives the Fury of the Royal Berserker, dealing massive damage to your enemies

702.name: Unstoppable Death
702.description: Deliver a blow that steals the life of enemies

703.name: Grail
703.description: Summons the power of the Holy Grail, gaining a buff to armor, agility and intelligence

704.name: Human Guillotine
704.description: Envelops the enemy in a guillotine made by your arms, executing him

800.name: HeadShot
800.description: Shoots the enemy perfectly in the head

801.name: Metallic Blast
801.description: Gathers the steel of your arrows to deliver a metal aerial attack, also increasing your agility

802.name: crossbow
802.description: Summons a crossbow to the battlefield, firing squarely at your enemy

803.name: Poisoned Arrows
803.description: Shoots poison arrows at your enemies, poisoning them

804.name: Agile Dodge
804.description: Dodge, Dodge, I read your powers, you're not a monster, I read mine, I'm better an archer, I disappear! Gain agility and reduce the enemy's

900.name: Demonic Contract
900.description: Make a contract with a demon, increasing its intelligence and damage

901.name: FÃ«anor
901.description: Calls the Demon FÃ«anor into battle, damaging his enemies

902.name: Gravity Curve
902.description: Creates a curve in space-time, crushing your enemies with the power of physics

903.name: Contract: Abezethibou
903.description: Contracts with Superior Demon Abezethibou, receiving an agility buff, healing himself and damaging enemies

904.name: Astaroth
904.description: Gives a short visit from Astaroth in battle, executing his enemies

1000.name: Tame
1000.description: Tames a wild animal to transport, increasing its agility and damage

1001.name: Temporal Claws
1001.description: Send the King of Beasts and Space Time to scratch his enemy, beyond the limits of time

1002.name: Tame: Tiger
1002.description: Tames a tiger to drastically increase its stats. Gaining a buff to damage, agility and armor

1003.name: Spectral Spear
1003.description: Sends a spear directly from the jungle to strike your enemy, poisoning them

1004.name: Taming: BoitatÃ¡
1004.description: Tames the BoitatÃ¡, increasing its damage, agility, armor and intelligence

1100.name: Divine Fists
1100.description: Summons two fists that deliver a powerful attack to your enemy

1101.name: The Great Silence
1101.description: Starts your legendary silence, focusing on battle, receiving a damage buff

1102.name: Buddha Palm
1102.description: Buddha is on parade, and pats his enemy

1103.name: Touch of Death
1103.description: Gives your enemy a tiny flick, dealing deadly damage to the enemy

1104.name: Meditation
1104.description: Starts your meditation, receiving an agility and intelligence buff

1200.name: Spear the Spear
1200.description: Throws his spear at the enemy, causing damage

1201.name: Spear Advance
1201.description: Advances with his spear, receiving an agility buff

1202.name: Death Dance
1202.description: Initiates deadly dancing moves, dealing damage to enemies

1203.name: Whirlwind
1203.description: Starts spinning nonstop until it creates a whirlpool, gaining agility and dealing damage to enemies

1204.name: Placed in the Chest
1204.description: Spears your spear into your enemy's chest, dealing mortal damage
